summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 KIA SORENTO. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 10 MPH, THE VEHICLE SHUT OFF AND THE OIL WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER (MYRTLE BEACH KIA IN MYRTLE BEACH, SC) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FAILURE WAS DUE TO AN INTERNAL ENGINE FAILURE. THE DEALER RECOMMENDED THAT THE ENGINE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND STATED THAT THE WARRANTY APPLIED TO THE ORIGINAL OWNER ONLY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 73,864.
